content.prompt: Country Z is both a producer and an importer of green tea. If country Z imposes a tariff on imports of green tea, which of the following will occur in the domestic market of green tea?

choices.label: Total consumption of green tea will increase.
The price paid by domestic consumers will decrease.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
